Description:
Isaac (Wei-Chun) Huang is a multidisciplinary Taiwanese engineer/designer with a background in computer science and industrial design. He is passionate about technology and driven to bring innovative ideas to life.

After completing his studies in London, Isaac's strong desire to bridge the gap between concepts and tangible products propelled him to dive into the engineering field and pursue a career as a front-end software engineer. In this role, he collaborated with a diverse international team to introduce IoT solutions to the pharmaceutical industry.

Education.School: Imperial College London / Royal College of Art
Education.Additional: Scholarship: GSSA, Ministry of Education, Taiwan

Education.Degree: BSc, Computer Science and Information Engineering

Experience.Title: Software Engineer, D&T, Front-End R&D
Experience.Company name: West Pharmaceutical Services (was Exosite IoT Solutions)

Experience.Title: Teaching Assistant
Experience.Company name: Department of Industrial Design, National Cheng Kung University

Experience.Title: Executive Editor
Experience.Company name: College of Planning & Design, National Cheng Kung University

Experience.Title: Assistant
Experience.Company name: Economic Development Section of Daan District Office, Taipei City

Activity.Name: IT Volunteer
Activity.Organization: Department of Tourism, Lienchiang County Government

Skill.Front-end: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Redux, Jest, Vue.js
